metadata.title: CVE-2024-31744 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Jasper 4.2.2, the jpc_streamlist_remove function insrc/libjasper/jpc/jpc_dec.c:2407 has an assertion failure vulnerability,allowing attackers to cause a denial of service attack through a specificimage file.

criterions.comment: jasper package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
